name: Marrakech
description: A vibrant city known for its historic medina, bustling souks, and beautiful gardens. Explore iconic sites like Jemaa el-Fnaa and the Koutoubia Mosque.

name: Chefchaouen
description: Known as the Blue City, Chefchaouen is famous for its blue-washed buildings and stunning mountain scenery. A perfect place for relaxation and photography.

name: Fes
description: Fes is one of the oldest cities in Morocco, known for its medieval architecture, vibrant souks, and the world's oldest university, Al Quaraouiyine.

name: Essaouira
description: A coastal city known for its historic medina, beautiful beaches, and vibrant arts scene. Essaouira is a UNESCO World Heritage site.

name: Agadir
description: Agadir is famous for its beautiful beaches and sunny weather. It's a great destination for relaxation and water sports.

name: Ouarzazate
description: Known as the 'Hollywood of Morocco,' Ouarzazate is famous for its film studios and the stunning Ait Benhaddou kasbah.

name: Tangier
description: Tangier is a port city that offers a mix of cultures and stunning coastal views. It's a gateway to exploring both Morocco and Europe.

name: Merzouga
description: Merzouga is known for its stunning sand dunes and desert experiences. It's a popular starting point for Sahara Desert adventures.
